text: Juan Camilo Roa Estrada (born 14 November 1994) is a Colombian footballer who plays as a midfielder for Jaguares de Córdoba on loan from Atlético Junior in the Categoría Primera A. ==Honours== ===Club=== Uniautónoma *Primera B (1): 2013 Junior *Copa Colombia (1): 2017 ==External links== * Category:Living people Category:1994 births Category:People from Atlántico Department Category:Colombian footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Cortuluá footballers Category:Atlético Junior footballers
title: Juan Camilo Roa
